014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.Constable;
017import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
018import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
019import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Objects;
024import java.util.Optional;
025
026import java.util.function.Predicate;
027
028import javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType;
029import javax.lang.model.type.PrimitiveType;
030import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
031import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
032
033import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
034
035import org.microbean.lang.Equality;
036import org.microbean.lang.Lang;
037
038import org.microbean.lang.type.DelegatingTypeMirror;
039
040import org.microbean.qualifier.NamedAttributeMap;
041
042import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
043import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_boolean;
044import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
045import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.FALSE;
046import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.TRUE;
047import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC;
048
049import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Assignability;
050import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_BeanSelectionCriteria;
051import static org.microbean.bean.InterceptorBindings.anyInterceptorBinding;
052import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.anyQualifier;
053import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.defaultQualifier;
054import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.defaultQualifiers;
055
056import static org.microbean.lang.ConstantDescs.CD_TypeMirror;
057
058public final class BeanSelectionCriteria implements Constable {
059
060
061  /*
062   * Static fields.
063   */
064
065
066  private static final Equality EQUALITY_IGNORING_ANNOTATIONS = new Equality(false);
067
068  private static final Equality SAME_TYPE_EQUALITY = new SameTypeEquality();
069
070
071  /*
072   * Instance fields.
073   */
074
075
076  private final Assignability assignability;
077
078  private final DelegatingTypeMirror type;
079
080  private final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes;
081
082  private final boolean box;
083
084
085  /*
086   * Constructors.
087   */
088
089
090  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final TypeMirror type) {
091    this(new Assignability(), type);
092  }
093
094  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final TypeMirror type, final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
095    this(new Assignability(), type, attributes);
096  }
097
098  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final Assignability assignability, final TypeMirror type) {
099    this(assignability, type, defaultQualifiers());
100  }
101
102  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final Assignability assignability,
103                               final TypeMirror type,
104                               final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
105    this(assignability, type, attributes, true);
106  }
107
108  public BeanSelectionCriteria(final Assignability assignability,
109                               final TypeMirror type,
110                               final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
111                               final boolean box) {
112    super();
113    this.assignability = assignability == null ? new Assignability() : assignability;
114    this.type = DelegatingTypeMirror.of(validateType(type, box), this.assignability.typeAndElementSource(), SAME_TYPE_EQUALITY);
115    this.attributes = List.copyOf(attributes);
116    this.box = box;
117  }
118
119
120  /*
121   * Instance methods.
122   */
123
124
125  public final TypeMirror type() {
126    return this.type;
127  }
128
129  public final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes() {
130    return this.attributes;
131  }
132
133  public final boolean box() {
134    return this.box;
135  }
136
137  public final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> interceptorBindings() {
138    return InterceptorBindings.interceptorBindings(this.attributes());
139  }
140
141  public final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> qualifiers() {
142    return Qualifiers.qualifiers(this.attributes());
143  }
144
145  public final boolean selects(final Id id) {
146    return this.selects(id.types().types(), id.attributes());
147  }
148
149  public final boolean selects(final Bean<?> bean) {
150    return this.selects(bean.id().types().types(), bean.id().attributes());
151  }
152
153  public final boolean selects(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
154    return this.selects(List.of(beanSelectionCriteria.type()), beanSelectionCriteria.attributes());
155  }
156
157  public final boolean selects(final TypeMirror type) {
158    return this.selects(List.of(type), List.of());
159  }
160
161  public final boolean selects(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> types) {
162    return this.selects(types, List.of());
163  }
164
165  public final boolean selects(final TypeMirror type, final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
166    return this.selects(List.of(type), attributes);
167  }
168
169  public final boolean selects(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> types,
170                               final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
171    return this.selectsQualifiers(attributes) && this.selectsInterceptorBindings(attributes) && this.selectsTypeFrom(types);
172  }
173
174  public final BeanSelectionCriteria withType(final TypeMirror type) {
175    if (type == this.type()) {
176      return this;
177    }
178    return new BeanSelectionCriteria(this.assignability, type, this.attributes(), this.box());
179  }
180
181  public final BeanSelectionCriteria withAttributes(final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
182    if (attributes == this.attributes()) {
183      return this;
184    }
185    return new BeanSelectionCriteria(this.assignability, this.type(), List.copyOf(attributes), this.box());
186  }
187
188  public final BeanSelectionCriteria withBox(final boolean box) {
189    if (box == this.box()) {
190      return this;
191    }
192    return new BeanSelectionCriteria(this.assignability, this.type(), this.attributes(), box);
193  }
194
195  private final boolean selectsInterceptorBindings(final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
196    final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> herBindings = InterceptorBindings.interceptorBindings(attributes);
197    if (herBindings.isEmpty()) {
198      return this.interceptorBindings().isEmpty();
199    } else if (herBindings.size() == 1 && anyInterceptorBinding(herBindings.iterator().next())) {
200      return true;
201    }
202    final List<NamedAttributeMap<?>> ibs = this.interceptorBindings();
203    return ibs.size() == herBindings.size() && ibs.containsAll(herBindings) && herBindings.containsAll(ibs);
204  }
205
206  private final boolean selectsQualifiers(final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes) {
207    final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> myQualifiers = this.qualifiers();
208    // final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> herQualifiers = attributes.stream().filter(QUALIFIER::describes).toList();
209    final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> herQualifiers = Qualifiers.qualifiers(attributes);
210    if (myQualifiers.isEmpty()) {
211      // Pretend I had [@Default] and she had [@Default, @Any].
212      return herQualifiers.isEmpty() || containsAll(herQualifiers::contains, defaultQualifiers());
213    } else if (herQualifiers.isEmpty()) {
214      for (final NamedAttributeMap<?> myQualifier : myQualifiers) {
215        if (anyQualifier(myQualifier) || defaultQualifier(myQualifier)) {
216          // I had [@Default] or [@Any] or [@Default, @Any]; pretend she had [@Default, @Any].
217          return true;
218        }
219      }
220      return false;
221    } else {
222      return containsAll(herQualifiers::contains, myQualifiers);
223    }
224  }
225
226  final boolean selectsTypeFrom(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> types) {
227    return this.assignability.oneMatches(this.type(), types);
228  }
229
230  @Override // Constable
231  public final Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<BeanSelectionCriteria>> describeConstable() {
232    return this.assignability.describeConstable()
233      .flatMap(assignabilityDesc -> Lang.describeConstable(this.type())
234               .flatMap(typeDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.attributes())
235                        .map(attributesDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
236                                                                      MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(STATIC,
237                                                                                                CD_BeanSelectionCriteria,
238                                                                                                "of",
239                                                                                                MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_BeanSelectionCriteria,
240                                                                                                                  CD_Assignability,
241                                                                                                                  CD_TypeMirror,
242                                                                                                                  CD_Collection,
243                                                                                                                  CD_boolean)),
244                                                                      assignabilityDesc,
245                                                                      typeDesc,
246                                                                      attributesDesc,
247                                                                      this.box ? TRUE : FALSE))));
248  }
249
250  @Override // Object
251  public final int hashCode() {
252    int hashCode = 17;
253    hashCode = 31 * hashCode + this.type().hashCode();
254    hashCode = 31 * hashCode + this.attributes().hashCode();
255    hashCode = 31 * hashCode + (this.box() ? 1 : 0);
256    return hashCode;
257  }
258
259  @Override // Object
260  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
261    if (other == this) {
262      return true;
263    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
264      final BeanSelectionCriteria her = (BeanSelectionCriteria)other;
265      return
266        Objects.equals(this.type(), her.type()) &&
267        Objects.equals(this.attributes(), her.attributes()) &&
268        Objects.equals(this.box(), her.box());
269    } else {
270      return false;
271    }
272  }
273
274  @Override
275  public final String toString() {
276    return
277      this.getClass().getSimpleName() + "[" +
278      "type=" + this.type() + ", " +
279      "attributes=" + this.attributes() + ", " +
280      "box=" + this.box() +
281      "]";
282  }
283
284
285  /*
286   * Static methods.
287   */
288
289
290  private static final TypeMirror validateType(final TypeMirror type, final boolean box) {
291    final TypeKind k = type.getKind();
292    if (box && k.isPrimitive()) {
293      return Lang.boxedClass((PrimitiveType)type).asType();
294    }
295    return switch (k) {
296    case ARRAY, BOOLEAN, BYTE, CHAR, DECLARED, DOUBLE, FLOAT, INT, LONG, SHORT -> type;
297    case ERROR, EXECUTABLE, INTERSECTION, MODULE, NONE, NULL, OTHER, PACKAGE, TYPEVAR, UNION, VOID, WILDCARD ->
298      throw new IllegalArgumentException("type: " + type);
299    };
300  }
301
302  // Returns the component type of t if is an array type. Returns t in all other cases.
303  private static final TypeMirror componentType(final TypeMirror t) {
304    return t.getKind() == TypeKind.ARRAY ? ((ArrayType)t).getComponentType() : t;
305  }
306
307  // Returns the element type of t if t is an array type. Returns t in all other cases.
308  private static final TypeMirror elementType(final TypeMirror t) {
309    return t.getKind() == TypeKind.ARRAY ? elementType(componentType(t)) : t;
310  }
311
312  private static final boolean containsAll(final Predicate<? super Object> p, final Iterable<?> i) {
313    for (final Object o : i) {
314      if (p.test(o)) {
315        continue;
316      }
317      return false;
318    }
319    return true;
320  }
321
322  // Called by describeConstable().
323  public static final BeanSelectionCriteria of(final Assignability a,
324                                               final TypeMirror type,
325                                               final Collection<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
326                                               final boolean box) {
327    return new BeanSelectionCriteria(a, type, List.copyOf(attributes), box);
328  }
329
330
331  /*
332   * Inner and nested classes.
333   */
334
335
336  private static final class SameTypeEquality extends Equality {
337
338    private SameTypeEquality() {
339      super(false);
340    }
341
342    @Override
343    public final boolean equals(final Object o1, final Object o2) {
344      if (o1 == o2) {
345        return true;
346      } else if (o1 instanceof TypeMirror t1 && o2 instanceof TypeMirror t2) {
347        return Lang.sameType(t1, t2);
348      } else {
349        return super.equals(o1, o2);
350      }
351    }
352
353  }
354
355}
